p: South Korea is responsible for more than 98% of the population's health cover system, and patient assessment and evaluation are managed by the Health Insurance Review and Assessment Service (HIRA). [ 15] Therefore, the HIRA database contains disease information for almost the entire population of South Korea. Open data are available which does not contain any personal information, through a rigorous screening process for research purposes only. We extracted information on pediatric HSP patients from the HIRA database.
